DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct compare success complication rate ureteroscopy , shockwaves lithotripsy treatment upper ureteric stone ≤1 cm .
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct compare success complication rate Flexible , Semi-rigid URS , SWL approach proximal ureteric stone size ≤1 cm .
DOC.criteria: Radioopaque stone less equal 1 cm Active UTI Coagulopathy Pregnancy Ureteric stricture
